label: 六波羅探題
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: The two Kamakura deputies for central and western Japan, headquartered in the Rokuhara Palace at Kyoto; first appointed after the Jōkyū War of 1221. These were counterparts of the later Kyushu deputies, though the latter were given greater powers.　[承久の乱]
